title: Revert forced beyhubx.com redirect and canonical metadata

requirements.text: Remove the hard-coded redirect-to-domain behavior so the app no longer forces navigation to https://beyhubx.com and remains reachable on the platform’s default/working URL.
acceptanceCriteria: Opening the app on a non-beyhubx.com host does not trigger a redirect to beyhubx.com.
The app loads successfully on the platform’s default/working deployment URL.

requirements.text: Update frontend HTML head metadata to stop hard-coding https://beyhubx.com as the canonical/preview URL (canonical link, og:url, twitter:url) so metadata does not point to an unreachable domain while DNS is not configured.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html no longer contains canonical/OG/Twitter URL values that are hard-coded to https://beyhubx.com/.
The app’s HTML head remains valid and includes title/description metadata without breaking the build.

constraints: Frontend paths listed as immutable must not be edited (compose UI components instead).
Do not introduce new backend services; keep to the existing single-actor Motoko backend architecture.
nonGoals: Do not configure DNS records or provide registrar-specific DNS setup steps as part of this build.
Do not remove or rename the in-app branding text 'Bey Hub X' unless explicitly requested.
